title: Fragment, 1921-22-34, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet) with supplementary weft
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Fragment of purple cut and uncut velvet on silk ground originally heavily shot with silver metal thread. Design of a small branch with two leaves curving in opposite directions. Horizontal rows of design turn alternately left and right.
